turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about 2007 Rexall Grand Prix of Edmonton.
turn.1: What happened at the 2007 Rexall Grand Prix of Edmonton?
turn.2: 2007 Rexall Grand Prix of Edmonton The 2007 Rexall Grand Prix of Edmonton was the eighth round of the 2007 Champ Car World Series Season, and was held on July 22, 2007 at Rexall Speedway in Edmonton, Alberta, Canada.
turn.4: The race was won by Sébastien Bourdais followed by Justin Wilson and Graham Rahal.
turn.6: Will Power won his fourth career pole position by nipping Justin Wilson by .007 of a second.
turn.8: Power knocked the front wing off his car while going off course during his final lap, but Wilson was unable to better Power's earlier best lap.
turn.9: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.10: Sébastien Bourdais was only fourth fastest on Saturday but his top time from Friday secured him a front row beside his championship rival Power.
turn.12: Tristan Gommendy will not take part in the race after suffering a back injury when he contacted the wall in Friday's qualification session.
